topic.title: how to use tor？
topic.body: I use windows. tor was bundled to zeronet. but how can I set?

topic.title: how to use zeronet with tor on win10
topic.body:
I do not know ho to edit torrc. 
how to edit?
# Tor config for ZeroNet

DataDirectory data
DirReqStatistics 0
GeoIPFile geoip\geoip
GeoIPv6File geoip\geoip6

# Log notice file data\notice.log

ControlPort 49051
SOCKSPort 49050

CookieAuthentication 1

topic.title: when I use “tor always” some problem was happen
topic.body:
I can not link any site and update
![qq 20171016223209](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14255631/31617520-02c1e520-b2c2-11e7-8015-7ff90aed7fb1.png)

topic.title: what happen？
topic.body: I reloaded zeronet， and restored user.json. But I found that I lost control of the original blog

topic.title: how to back-up blog and my ID？
topic.body: I want to back-up my ID and the blog I usually visit. And I have my own blog, I also want to back-up it

topic.title: Recommendation to add proxy settings to ZeroNet
topic.body: Can you add settings to let users set up Tor via ZeroNet? Please edit the file [probably README.md or Wiki], the current way is not very user-friendly.

topic.title: why it shows this
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: _0.6.2_
  * Operating system: __win10___
  * Web browser: _chrome____
 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14255631/38765525-f5ad47c8-3ff5-11e8-92bf-6db11661116e.png)
why it shows upgrade failure？ it‘s my own site

topic.title: what happened to it
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: _0.6.2_rev3407___
  * Operating system: _win10____
  * Web browser: __chrome___
  * Tor status: always
  * Opened port: no
  * Special configuration: ____

what happened to me？ why I can not open a new site
